content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(40.5, -82.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- None (no structures have been built yet)

### Iron Ore location at position(2.5, -73.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- None (no structures have been built yet)

### Stone Furnace at position(3.5, -63.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 3.5, -63.5)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when attempting to place entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. In this case, you need a stone furnace to place it at the specified location.
- Check the recipe requirements for crafting entities to ensure you have the necessary materials available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you gather the required amount of raw resources before attempting to craft items. In the case of the stone furnace, ensure you have at least 2 stone before crafting.

### Errors when inserting items into an entity
- Ensure the second argument in the insert_item function is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position. Verify that you are passing the correct entity reference when attempting to insert items.
